com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl

Class ImageIcon<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>,Img extends GraphicalPrimitive<Rend,Pos,Scalar>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.extensibility.IExtensible
      • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
        • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.ImageIcon<Rend,Pos,Scalar,Img>
  • Type Parameters:
    Pos - Vector type used to define the position and dimensions of the element
    Rend - The renderer type that performs the drawing of the element to the screen or anywhere else
    Scalar - The scalar type that the Pos vector consists of
    Img - The exact type of the GraphicalPrimitive used as icon
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>, Element, Extensible, Drawable<Rend,Pos>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageIcon.Plain

    public class ImageIcon<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>,Img extends GraphicalPrimitive<Rend,Pos,Scalar>>
extends BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
    A basic DrawableElem implementation that holds a GraphicalPrimitive and renders it on the screen as the representation of itself.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus

        public ImageIcon(Img img)

        Parameters:
        img - the icon that will serve as the graphical representation of this, * its dimensions will be only settable through this, throwing RuntimeException otherwise

      • ImageIcon

        public ImageIcon(Img img,
                 Pos maxSize,
                 Pos minSize)
        Parameters:
        img - the icon that will serve as the graphical representation of this, its dimensions will be only settable through this, throwing RuntimeException otherwise
        maxSize - initial value for the maxSize property of this
        minSize - initial value for the minSize property of this

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public boolean draw(Rend renderer,
                    Pos position)
        Draws the icon on the screen. Called each frame, renders the Drawable on the screen.
        Parameters:
        renderer - The instance of Rend using which the Drawable is to be rendered
        position - The position on which the Drawable is supposed to be drawn. By convention should define the leftmost-downmost edge of the rectangle circumscribed to the this if in 2D space

      • update

        public void update(float delta,
                   int frameId)
        Does nothing. Called each frame of the game loop.
        Parameters:
        delta - the time in milliseconds elapsed from the last call of update
        frameId - the identifier of the current frame - can be used to detect skipped frames or update being called multiple times in one frame - incremented by 1 on each frame - does not uniquely define the frame, asi the number of frames in one game run is unlimited, unlike the capacity of int type

      • getVectUtil

        public VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> getVectUtil()
        Description copied from interface: DrawableElem
        Gets the VectUtil for the vector type used by this.

      • disownImg

        public void disownImg()
        Disassociates the img object from this. Makes the dimensions of img again settable by anyone.
